CustomField.description: This field is used when a login disruption occurs on the Docrio Email / Calendar add-in. In such cases, events will sync using the override event source instead of the original Docrio source.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This applies only when a login disruption occurs. In such cases, events will sync using the override event source instead of the original Docrio source.
CustomField.label: Docrio Override Source
